user.name: Vương Tuấn Anh
careerObjective:
I am a Full Stack Developer with 3 years of experience in Web Development. I have over 2 years of experience working on the Backend (PHP, Laravel) and more than 1 year on the Frontend (Vue.js, React.js).
My goal is to continuously improve my technical skills and contribute real value to products, striving to become a skilled and reliable Software Engineer.
about.intro:
Graduated from Electric Power University with a degree in Software Engineering (GPA 3.71/4.0).
I’m passionate about technology, always eager to explore how things work and how to make them better.
In my free time, I enjoy listening to music, watching movies, and developing personal projects.
My curiosity and dedication to continuous improvement have helped me earn recognition as Employee of the Month at Beetechsoft (May 2025).
